medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Hypoglycemia attack occurred at age 68 (22 mg/dL). Symptoms related to decreased food intake and body weight loss started several years prior, leading to significant weight reduction from 60 kg to 50 kg. Over time, the patient experienced decreased daily activities due to blindness in the left eye. Concerns about prolonged elevated glucose profiles arose four months after the initial presentation.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Diagnosed with type 2 diabetes in his 40s; lost vision in left eye due to diabetic retinopathy at age 64. No history of macrovascular complications.
